title: Prompt Contract v0.1
description: Schema for structured LLM prompt contracts, ensuring consistent input/output.

role.description: The role of the LLM in this interaction (e.g., planning, action generation, failure analysis).

task.description: A clear, concise description of the task the LLM needs to perform.

inputs.description: List of structured inputs provided to the LLM.

value.description: JSON string representation of the input value.

constraints.description: List of constraints the LLM must adhere to (e.g., 'JSON output only', 'Consider all obligations').

output_schema_uri.description: URI pointing to the JSON schema that the LLM's output must conform to.

budgets.description: Resource budgets for the LLM call.
